means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 拉克绰号，欢乐的人，或起得早的人，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“云雀”(lark)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 拉克来源于中世纪教名Larkin的逆序构词

sentence.Network_en: The children thought it was a great lark.
The boys didn't mean any harm—they just did it for a lark.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些男孩并无恶意—他们只是闹着玩罢了。

sentence.Network_en: He thinks it cruel to confine a lark in a cage.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为把云雀关在笼子里太残忍了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 月份与星期的英文_百度文库 ... plover 千鸟 lark 百鸟,云雀 swift 褐雨燕.
百字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 百炼千锤〖 thoroughlytempered〗 百灵鸟〖 lark〗 百侣〖 manycompanions〗.
以l开头的英语英文单词 ... largesse 慷慨援助，施舍 lark 玩笑，嬉耍 larkspur 燕草属植物.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... largesse 慷慨援助；施舍 lark 玩乐，嬉耍 larva (昆虫的)幼虫.

list.abs: a lark was singing high up in the sky .一只云雀在高空中歌唱。

Lovers live by love , as larks leeks ., 情侣靠爱情生活 , 犹如云雀靠韭葱生活.

jx.jx_en_mean: get out of bed very early in the morning

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English lǣferce, lǣwerce; related to Dutch leeuwerik and German Lerche; of unknown ultimate origin
early 19th cent.: perhaps from dialect lake 'play', from Old Norse leika, but compare with skylark in the same sense, which is recorded earlier

entry.def: A lark is a small brown bird which makes a pleasant sound.

entry.tran: （可能带有淘气或危险性质的）玩乐，玩耍，嬉戏
entry.def: If you say that doing something is a lark, you mean that it is fun, although perhaps naughty or dangerous.

example.ex: The children thought it was a great lark...
The chances are that the thief will be under 21 and doing it for a lark...
example.tran: 偷东西的很可能是个不到21岁的年轻人，干这事儿只是贪玩。

entry.tran: （用于幽默地表示好笑、愚蠢或多余）演戏这玩意儿/耍笔杆子这一行
entry.def: You use lark in expressions such as this acting lark and the writing lark to indicate humorously that you think an activity or job is amusing, foolish, or unnecessary.

example.ex: He got the part, and eventually decided the acting lark wasn't half bad.
example.tran: 他赢得了那个角色，一番考虑后觉得演戏这玩意儿感觉也还不错。

means.word_mean: 3. any of numerous predominantly Old World birds noted for their singing

means.word_mean: 一大早就起床；鸡鸣即起

sentences.en: She was up with the lark this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天她一大早就起床了。

means.word_mean: (因太费力而不想干时说)算了，够了，就这么得了

sentences.en: Sod that for a lark! I’m not doing any more tonight.
sentences.cn: 拉倒吧！ 我今晚再也不干了。
